select count(case when (ss.stock_count-ss.safety_stock) <0 AND m.material_item = '원재료' then 1 end) AS mainMaterial ,count(case when (ss.stock_count-ss.safety_stock)<0 AND m.material_item = '부재료' then 1 end) AS subMaterial ,count(case when (to_date(expiration_limit)-to_date(sysdate))<0 AND m.material_item = '원재료' AND s.remain_stock_count > 0 AND s.disposal_operation = 'k1' then 1 end) AS limitMaterial ,count(case when (to_date(expiration_limit)-to_date(sysdate))<0 AND m.material_item = '부재료' AND s.remain_stock_count > 0 AND s.disposal_operation = 'k1' then 1 end) AS limitsubMaterial ,count(case when so.oder_app = 'L1' then 1 end) AS oneMaterial ,count(case when so.oder_app = 'L2' then 1 end) AS twoMaterial
from store_stock ss join material m on ss.material_number = m.material_number join store_in s on s.material_number = m.material_number join order_details od on od.order_details_number = s.order_details_number join store_order so on so.order_number = od.order_number where ss.store_number=#{storeNumber}

with b as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1,'yy-MM-dd') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LAST_DAY(to_DATE(#{productDate}))- TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') + 1 ) , a as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(product_date, 'yy-MM-dd') AS dt ,sum(profits) profits FROM store_sales_statistics WHERE product_date BETWEEN TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(to_DATE(#{productDate})) AND store_NUMBEr = #{storeNumber} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(product_date, 'yy-MM-dd') ) SELECT b.dt , a.profits FROM a full outer join b on a.dt = b.dt ORDER BY b.dt

with b as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1,'yy-MM-dd') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LAST_DAY(to_DATE(#{productDate}))- TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') + 1 ) , a as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(product_date, 'yy-MM-dd') AS dt ,sum(count) count FROM store_product_sale WHERE product_date BETWEEN TRUNC(to_DATE(#{productDate}), 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(to_DATE(#{productDate})) AND store_Number = #{storeNumber} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(product_date, 'yy-MM-dd') ) SELECT b.dt , a.count FROM a full outer join b on a.dt = b.dt ORDER BY b.dt

select so.order_Day ,m.material_name ,od.count ,si.remain_stock_count ,si.expiration_limit ,si.order_details_number ,si.material_Number from store_in si join order_details od on si.order_details_number = od.order_details_number join store_order so on so.order_number = od.order_number join material m on m.material_number = si.material_number where si.store_number = #{storeNumber} AND si.remain_stock_count > 0 AND si.disposal_operation = 'k1' order by order_day
